meanings.definition: An herbal infusion or tea made from steeping various plants or herbs in hot water.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy a warm tisane before bedtime to help me relax.
meanings.sent2: She sipped on a fragrant tisane while reading her book.
meanings.sent3: The tisane was so soothing that it almost felt like a hug in a cup.
meanings.sent4: The tisane worked its magic, calming her nerves like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the tisane filled the room, bringing a sense of tranquility.

meanings.definition: A beverage made by infusing herbs or plants in hot water.
meanings.sent1: The tisane served at the cafe had a unique blend of flavors.
meanings.sent2: He ordered a tisane to warm up on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent3: The tisane was so delicious that he couldn't resist having a second cup.
meanings.sent4: Her tisane was like a symphony of herbs dancing on her taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The tisane was a refreshing elixir, rejuvenating both body and mind.
